identity.title: (Arraylist) Check if same number of even and odd numbers in two arraylists

content.prompt: Write a function (static method) that takes two int arraylistsas parameters, and returns true if they both have the samenumber of even values, and false otherwise. For example:sameNumEvens( {1,2,3}, {4,5,6} ) => falsesameNumEvens( {1,2,3}, {5,6,7} ) => truesameNumEvens( {-2,2,18,36}, {1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8} ) => true
